titleStmt.title: The narrovv vvay, and the last iudgement deliuered in two sermons: the first at Pauls Crosse, the other elsewhere, by G.B. preacher of the word at Alphamston in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Bury, George.
Brian, G., attributed name.
C. B., fl. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Matthew Lownes,

notesStmt.note: G.B. = George Bury; sometimes attributed to G. Brian.
Identified as STC 1029 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; L4, final leaf, mutilated, with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
